biotools.summary: A freely available web application to automatically check the quality of SNP data employing the ABI 7900 HT-platform or the Sequenom iPLEX platform: Single raw output files of plates are automatically merged and converted to genotype lists.

bioschemas.name: SNPflow
bioschemas.summary: A freely available web application to automatically check the quality of SNP data employing the ABI 7900 HT-platform or the Sequenom iPLEX platform: Single raw output files of plates are automatically merged and converted to genotype lists.
